Network Working Group                                           S. Hares

This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: This document reports the results of the BGP-4 implementation survey. The survey had 259 questions about implementations' support of BGP-4 as specified in RFC 4271. After a brief summary of the results, each response is listed. This document contains responses from the four implementers that completed the survey (Alcatel, Cisco, Laurel, and NextHop) and brief information from three that did not (Avici, Data Connection Ltd., and Nokia).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件报告了BGP-4实施调查的结果。这项调查有259个关于RFC 4271中规定的BGP-4实施支持的问题。在简要总结结果后，将列出每个响应。本文档包含完成调查的四个实施者（阿尔卡特、思科、劳雷尔和NextHop）的回复，以及三个未完成调查的实施者（Avici、数据连接有限公司和诺基亚）的简要信息。

contents.text: The editors did not use exterior means to verify the accuracy of the information submitted by the respondents. The respondents are experts with the products they reported on.
contents.zh-CHS: 编辑没有使用外部手段来验证受访者提交的信息的准确性。受访者是他们所报告产品的专家。

This document reports results from a survey of implementations of
BGP-4 as specified in [RFC4271].  RFC 4271 is in alignment with
current deployments of BGP-4 and obsoletes the BGP standard
[RFC1771].  BGP is a widely deployed cornerstone of Internet
technology that continues to add additional functionality as the
needs of the Internet evolve.  As deployed in the Internet, BGP-4
encompasses both this base specification and additional
specifications such as TCP MD5 [RFC2385], BGP Route Reflectors
[RFC2796], BGP Confederations [RFC3065], and BGP Route Refresh
[RFC2918].

The BGP-4 implementation survey had 259 detailed questions about compliance with [RFC4271]. Four implementers (Alcatel, Cisco, Laurel, and NextHop) completed the survey. Section 3 provides a compilation of those results.
contents.zh-CHS: BGP-4实施调查有259个关于遵守[RFC4271]的详细问题。四个实施者（阿尔卡特、思科、劳雷尔和NextHop）完成了调查。第3节提供了这些结果的汇编。

contents.text: Section 2.1 highlights significant differences and Section 2.2 provides an overview of the differences between the four implementations. Section 2.3 provides interoperability information.
contents.zh-CHS: 第2.1节强调了显著的差异，第2.2节概述了四种实现之间的差异。第2.3节提供了互操作性信息。

contents.text: Due to the large number of BGP implementations and the small number of respondents, the editors took an informal survey to determine if the length of the original survey caused implementers not to submit it. Three implementers responded, and all indicated the length of the survey was the issue. Section 4 gives the results of this informal survey.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于BGP实施的数量较多，而受访者人数较少，编辑进行了一次非正式调查，以确定原始调查的长度是否导致实施者不提交。三位实施者做出了回应，他们都表示调查的长度是问题所在。第4节给出了这项非正式调查的结果。

contents.text: In this document, the editors have compiled the results of the implementation survey results and the informal survey.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文件中，编辑们汇编了执行情况调查结果和非正式调查结果。

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“必需”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: The respondents replied "Y" (yes) or "N" (no) to the survey's 259 questions to indicate whether their implementation supports the Functionality/Description of the [RFC2119] language in [RFC4271]. The respondents replied "O" (other) to indicate that the support is neither "Y" nor "N" (for example, an alternate behavior).
contents.zh-CHS: 受访者对调查的259个问题回答“是”或“否”，以表明其实现是否支持[RFC4271]中[RFC2119]语言的功能/描述。受访者回答“O”（其他），表示支持既不是“Y”也不是“N”（例如，另一种行为）。

contents.text: Each question received affirmative responses from at least two implementers (i.e., two "Y" responses, or one "Y" and one "O"), except the following questions:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个问题都得到了至少两个实施者的肯定回答（即两个“Y”回答，或一个“Y”和一个“O”），但以下问题除外：

contents.text: a) MUST - Linked Questions 212/213, regarding Section 9.1.4
contents.zh-CHS: a) 关于第9.1.4节的必须链接的问题212/213

contents.text: Due to the format of the linked questions, three vendors (Cisco, Laurel, and NextHop) replied "N" to Question 213. (See Section 2.2 for details.)
contents.zh-CHS: 由于链接问题的格式，三家供应商（Cisco、Laurel和NextHop）对问题213回答“N”。（详见第2.2节。）

contents.text: b) SHALL NOT - Question 228, regarding Section 9.2.2.2
contents.zh-CHS: b) 不得——关于第9.2.2.2节的问题228

contents.text: Three vendors (Alcatel, Cisco, and Laurel) answered "N" to SHALL NOT (meaning they did). One vendor (NextHop) indicated "O" matching the specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 三家供应商（阿尔卡特、思科和劳雷尔）对SHALL NOT的回答为“N”（意思是他们确实这么做了）。一家供应商（NextHop）表示“O”符合规范。

contents.text: Text: Routes that have different MULTI_EXIT_DISC attribute SHALL NOT be aggregated. (Section 9.2.2.2, [RFC4271])
contents.zh-CHS: 文本：不应聚合具有不同多出口盘属性的路由。（第9.2.2.2节，[RFC4271]）

contents.text: c) SHOULD - Questions 257 and 258, regarding Appendix F
contents.zh-CHS: c) 应-关于附录F的问题257和258

contents.text: Three vendors answered "N" and one vendor answered "Y" to Question 257. All four vendors answered "N" to Question 258. (Please note that support of Appendix F, "Implementation Recommendations", is optional.)
contents.zh-CHS: 三家供应商对问题257回答“N”，一家供应商回答“Y”。四家供应商对问题258的回答均为“N”。（请注意，附录F“实施建议”的支持是可选的。）

contents.text: Text: A BGP speaker which needs to withdraw a destination and send an update about a more specific or less specific route SHOULD combine them into the same UPDATE message. (Appendix F.2, [RFC4271])
contents.zh-CHS: 文本：需要撤回目的地并发送关于更具体或不太具体路线的更新的BGP扬声器应将它们合并到相同的更新消息中。（附录F.2，[RFC4271]）

contents.text: Text: The last instance (rightmost occurrence) of that AS number is kept. (Appendix F.6, [RFC4271])
contents.zh-CHS: Text：保留该AS编号的最后一个实例（最右边的引用）。（附录F.6，[RFC4271]）

contents.text: d) MAY - Questions 180 and 254, regarding Sections 8.1.2.4 and 10
contents.zh-CHS: d) 五月-关于第8.1.2.4节和第10节的问题180和254

contents.text: Three vendors answered "N", and 1 replied "Y" to Question 180.
contents.zh-CHS: 三个供应商对问题180回答“N”，1个回答“Y”。

contents.text: Text: The Event numbers (1-28) utilized in this state machine description aid in specifying the behavior of the BGP state machine. Implementations MAY use these numbers to provide network management information. The exact form of a FSM or the FSM events are specific to each implementation. (Section 8.1.2.4, [RFC4271])
contents.zh-CHS: 文本：此状态机描述中使用的事件编号（1-28）有助于指定BGP状态机的行为。实现可以使用这些数字来提供网络管理信息。FSM或FSM事件的确切形式特定于每个实现。（第8.1.2.4节，[RFC4271]）

contents.text: Editors' note: Section 8.1.2.4 was written to allow existing implementations to transition to the new event numbering. It was expected over time (3 years) that the FSM event numbering would be updated to the new numbering.
contents.zh-CHS: 编者注：编写第8.1.2.4节是为了允许现有的实现过渡到新的事件编号。预计随着时间的推移（3年），FSM事件编号将更新为新编号。

contents.text: Three vendors answered "N" and one answered "Y" to Question 254 about configurable jitter time values.
contents.zh-CHS: 关于可配置抖动时间值的问题254，三家供应商回答“N”，一家回答“Y”。

contents.text: Text: A given BGP speaker MAY apply the same jitter to each of these quantities regardless of the destinations to which the updates are being sent; that is, jitter need not be configured on a "per peer" basis. (Section 10, [RFC4271])
contents.zh-CHS: 文本：一个给定的BGP扬声器可能会对这些数量中的每一个应用相同的抖动，而不管更新发送到哪个目的地；也就是说，不需要在“每个对等”的基础上配置抖动。（第10节，[RFC4271]）

contents.text: Question: Is the jitter range configurable?
contents.zh-CHS: 问题：抖动范围是否可配置？

contents.text: This section provides the reader with a shortcut to the points where the four implementations differ.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节为读者提供了四种实现不同点的快捷方式。

contents.text: The following questions were not answered "Y" by all four respondents (Note that the question numbers correspond to the final digit of subsection numbers of Section 3):
contents.zh-CHS: 以下问题未被所有四位受访者回答为“Y”（请注意，问题编号对应于第3节小节编号的最后一位）：

contents.text: Three vendors answered "N" and one answered "Y" to Question 213 about the aggregation of routes. Questions 212 and 213 are grouped together.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于关于路线聚合的问题213，三家供应商回答“N”，一家回答“Y”。问题212和213组合在一起。

contents.text: Question 212 states: "The decision process MUST either install both routes or..."
contents.zh-CHS: 问题212指出：“决策过程必须安装两条路由或…”

contents.text: Question 213 states: "Aggregate the two routes and install the aggregated route, provided that both routes have the same value of the NEXT_HOP attribute"
contents.zh-CHS: 问题213指出：“聚合两个路由并安装聚合路由，前提是两个路由具有相同的NEXT_HOP属性值”

contents.text: Of the four respondents that said "Y" to Question 212, three said "N" to Question 213. Given the context of the question, answering "N" to Question 213 is appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 在对问题212回答“Y”的四名受访者中，有三名对问题213回答“N”。鉴于问题的背景，对问题213回答“N”是适当的。
